EmailTemplate.name: San Francisco - Fall 2011.SF Associate Reception Fall 2011 B
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - MBO Partners' Fall Networking Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MBO Partners' Fall 2011 Networking Reception: Fairmont San Francisco - The Tonga Room, Dec. 7, 5:30 PM - 8:30 PM
It's about that time again! Mark your calendar for an event you do not want to miss! Please join the MBO team, Associates, as well as representatives from many of our prestigious clients, for a night of networking and fun at the San Francisco Fairmont's Tonga Room.
MBO invites you to this Networking Reception to learn about some of our exciting new initiatives, meet and mingle with fellow Associates, Clients, and MBO team managers, all while enjoying tasty cocktails, a live music band, and luscious hors d'oeuvres! Consider this a token of our appreciation for being part of our MBO family.
This is a party you do not want to miss, so hurry and register today, as space is limited - we all know how popular this reception is!
We look forward to seeing you! Register here: http://fallnetworkingreception2011.eventbrite.com
Sincerely,
MBO Partners
Suggested dress code is business to business casual Don't forget to bring your business cards Questions? Please contact Marcelle Saab, Associate Relations Manager, 703-793-6006
